entities.name: rita
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a journalist who is interviewing Harry and Hagrid about the Blast-Ended Skrewts. She asks questions about the creatures and their origin.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts who has brought the Blast-Ended Skrewts to class. He seems nervous when Rita asks where he got them from.

entities.name: blast-ended skrewts
entities.description: The Blast-Ended Skrewts are fascinating creatures that Hagrid has brought to class for the Care of Magical Creatures lesson.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student in the Care of Magical Creatures class who seems uninterested in the Blast-Ended Skrewts. He is also being interviewed by Rita Skeeter.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student in the Care of Magical Creatures class who tries to deflect attention from Hagrid's nervousness about the Blast-Ended Skrewts.
